characters.name: Satou
characters.description:
Satou is an Ajin. He is referred to by officials such as Yuu Tosaki as Hat (帽子, Boshi). His real name is Samuel T. Owen.

While Satou's father is British and his mother is Chinese, he himself is from the United States of America. He was part of the United States Marine Corps in the past. Before dying for the first time he had a large x-shaped scar on the left side of his face and was missing his right leg.

He is passionate about video games and gaming in general.

characters.name: Izumi Shimomura
characters.description:
__Height:__ 155 cm

Izumi Shimomura is an Ajin. Her name is taken from her birth father's last name (Shimomura) and her mother's maiden name (Izumi). Her former name was Yoko Tainaka. 

Izumi is a rather quiet and reserved individual, talking mainly when informing Tosaki about something. Her answers are usually short and to the point. Even though she is an Ajin, she chose to live between humans in secret and doesn't seem to be consumed completely by resentment towards humans despite her background. She seems to be quite intelligent and understanding, both towards Tosaki and when interrogating Nagai Kei's younger sister, Eriko. However, despite her initial stoic appearance, she can get embarrassed easily (for example when she said too much to Eriko and when Tosaki commented on her casual clothes).
~!Due to her past trauma caused by both of her parents and love life, she became very depressed and suicidal, often cutting herself and eventually ends up attempting suicide.!~

characters.name: Kei Nagai
characters.description:
Kei Nagai is an Ajin and the main protagonist of the series.

Kei was first shown with an academic, serious personality. He is very intelligent and hardworking with ambitions to be a doctor who cures illnesses that don't yet have a cure; specifically to cure his sister Eriko.

Despite Kei's lack of emotional investment in others, he seems to have strong personal values that he tries to live by. He demonstrates gratitude for Kaito's help and cares about his welfare. He also doesn't begrudge Satō for having killed others to free him, but does not support killing more people unnecessarily.

(Source: Ajin Wiki)

characters.name: Kou Nakano
characters.description:
Kou Nakano is an Ajin. 
Nakano is very considerate of others; ~!stating he wanted to help Kei with taking down Satō, and later helping Kei escape even after he locked him in a wrecked truck.!~ He was also concerned for Izumi, saying she shouldn't put herself in danger. He is also a bit clumsy compared with other characters and often doesn't know what's going on. As seen in the recent chapters, he is not good with coming up with plans and prefers to improvise instead. This results in him relying on Kei a lot with strategic plans, much to Kei's annoyance. 

it is revealed that Kō had first died when changing a light bulb. He stacked a bunch of magazines on top of each other, and tripped. After that, he was left paralyzed on the floor for days, but no one came. He then most likely died of dehydration. It is also pointed out that Kō had abusive, or at least neglective, parents.

characters.name: Yuu Tosaki
characters.description:
Yuu Tosaki is a high-ranked member of the Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare.

Generally, Tosaki has a commanding air about him and wears a serious expression. His answers are always short and to the point. He is also quite blunt and lacks patience.

He's quick to anger with certain triggers, such as multiple instances in which he snaps at the mispronunciation of his name - "Tozaki" as opposed to what he claims is correct, "Tosaki".

From the very start, Tosaki is shown to be morally ambiguous. It isn't above him to resort to violence through either his own force or those beneath him to get something done. If the consequences of his actions don't have a direct effect on him, his reaction is mild at best.

Tosaki relies heavily on Izumi Shimomura to protect him from the Ajin and their IBM with her own abilities, threatening her with the prospect of being locked up and experimented on if he dies.

characters.name: Kouji Tanaka
characters.description:
Kouji Tanaka is the second Ajin discovered in Japan. He is a partner to Satou.

Tanaka shows a rather large resentment towards humanity after the daily torture and experiments he was subjected to during his capture. Other than this, he is rather impassive; not really getting frustrated or angry in many situations, and is completely unresponsive to bloodshed and gore.

(Source: Ajin Wiki)

characters.name: Ritsu Nagai
characters.description: Ritsu Nagai is Kei and Eriko Nagai's mother. She used to work as an emergency physician.

characters.name: Hirasawa
characters.description:
Hirasawa is a 'man in black' who used to work for Kido. 
~!After Kido is killed in the Nakamura Shinya's Case, he is later hired by Tosaki to fight Sato. He takes a role as Kei Nagai's mentor.!~
~!At the Forge Security building, Hirasawa saves Kei from being beheaded by Sato, which results him to be left alone to fight Sato. After murdering him by hand-to-hand combat, Sato calls him as a 'tough old man'.!~

characters.name: Kaito
characters.description:
Kaito is Kei's childhood friend and the only human person in the entire country who makes an effort to help Kei despite the fact he is an Ajin.

Kaito is shown to be a very loyal and supportive friend for reasons not yet made known. Without hesitation, he helps Kei flee despite the fact that Kei had rejected him as a friend.

Though situations become increasingly worse, he appears to retain a very positive, determined attitude. He is very resourceful and though he is not as intelligent as Kei, he is able to make tactical decisions while they were on the run together.

(Source: Ajin Wiki)

characters.name: Masumi Okuyama
characters.description: He is an Ajin born with a weak leg. He is very knowledgable about guns and computers. (MAL)

characters.name: Araki
characters.description:
Araki is a detective from the investigation department. He assisted in the search for Kei Nagai at the beginning of the series.

(Source: Ajin Wiki)

characters.name: Shinya Nakamura
characters.description: Shinya Nakamura died in a motorcycle accident and afterward realized he was an Ajin, the first one to be found in Japan. He is responsible for the infamous "Flood Incident" which occurred right after.

characters.name: Reiji Akiyama
characters.description:
__Reiji Akiyama__ is an Ajin. He stated to be a fireman with a wife and a daughter.

Akiyama has a strong sense of duty and a high level of concern for the wellbeing of others. He is in many ways similar to Kō Nakano in this respect and is as one point described as being a "jock". He is brave, announcing that he will stop Sato's plans in their first encounter, and is also mentally strong enough to return to his senses and normal thinking after he had been locked in a barrel for around 5 weeks.

(Source: Ajin Wiki)

characters.name: Jun Suzuki
characters.description: Jun Suzuki is an Ajin currently living in America. She was the first officially reported Ajin in Japan.
